description.en: Generate a Point of Sale in a store. Each POS will have a unique QR Code linked to it
description.pt: Gerar um ponto de venda em uma loja. Cada caixa registradora terá um código QR exclusivo vinculado a ela
description.es: Genera un punto de venta en una sucursal. Cada caja tendrá vinculado un código QR unívoco

description.en: Define if the customer can insert the amount to be paid.
description.pt: Determine se o cliente pode inserir o valor a ser pago
description.es: Determina si el cliente puede insertar el monto a pagar

description.en: Store identifier to which the point of sale belongs.
description.pt: Identificador da loja à qual o caixa pertence
description.es: Identificador de la sucursal a la que pertenece el Punto de Venta

description.en: External_id of the store to which the pos belongs defined by integrator system.
description.pt: External_id of the store to which the pos belongs defined by integrator system.
description.es: External_id of the store to which the pos belongs defined by integrator system.

description.en: Unique identifier of the pos defined by integrator system.
description.pt: Identificador único da caixa definido pelo sistema integrador
description.es: Identificador único de la caja definido por el integrador

description.en: URL to get the order of the integrator system. It is optional and is used only in the unattended integration model.
description.pt: URL para obter a ordem do sistema integrador. É opcional e é usado apenas no modelo de integração desatendido.
description.es: URL para obtener la orden del sistema integrador. Es opcional y se utiliza solo en el modelo de integración desatendido.

description.en: HTTP body is required to create pos.
description.es: HTTP body is required to create pos.
description.pt: HTTP body is required to create pos.

description.en: The indicated field is not allowed for this operation or is unknown.
description.es: The indicated field is not allowed for this operation or is unknown.
description.pt: The indicated field is not allowed for this operation or is unknown.

description.en: The NAME must be less than 45 characters.
description.es: The NAME must be less than 45 characters.
description.pt: The NAME must be less than 45 characters.

description.en: The CATEGORY must be valid for the user's site.
description.es: The CATEGORY must be valid for the user's site.
description.pt: The CATEGORY must be valid for the user's site.

description.en: The EXTERNAL_STORE_ID does not refer to the indicated STORE_ID.

description.en: The EXTERNAL_STORE_ID does not refer to any existing store.

description.pt: The EXTERNAL_STORE_ID does not refer to any existing store.

description.en: The EXTERNAL_ID field must be alphanumeric, only letters and numbers. No spaces or hyphens, or special characters.
description.es: The EXTERNAL_ID field must be alphanumeric, only letters and numbers. No spaces or hyphens, or special characters.
description.pt: The EXTERNAL_ID field must be alphanumeric, only letters and numbers. No spaces or hyphens, or special characters.

description.en: The EXTERNAL_ID must be less than 40 characters.
description.es: The EXTERNAL_ID must be less than 40 characters.
description.pt: The EXTERNAL_ID must be less than 40 characters.

description.en: The URL must be string and muste have the format of a valid url
description.es: The URL must be string and muste have the format of a valid url
description.pt: The URL must be string and muste have the format of a valid url

description.en: The URL must be less than 300 characters.
description.es: The URL must be less than 300 characters.
description.pt: The URL must be less than 300 characters.

description.en: If the URL field is indicated, the FIXED_AMOUNT field must be true. We do not support the open amount modality in this case.

description.pt: If the URL field is indicated, the FIXED_AMOUNT field must be true. We do not support the open amount modality in this case.

description.en: If you are using the URL field, the host must be enabled by Mercado Pago. If it is not, you will receive this error. Please contact your assigned technical advisor.
